price: (199) And he had recited it to them [perfectly],[1061] they would [still] not have been believers in it.
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
